attributes.action: step down along with the government due to a vote of no confidence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of Britain are fed up with the current Goverment and wish to see them removed from power. Remember a Government should always be afraid of their people. A general election should be held as we did not vote the current PM into power.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
